wordGroup: play cricket ◎打板球 , ◎遵守比赛规则 , ◎行动光明正大

sentences.en: The standard of professional cricket has never been lower.
sentences.cn: 职业板球的水平从来没这么低过。

sentences.en: There was precious little about the cricket to animate the crowd.
sentences.cn: 这场板球比赛极少有让观众兴奋的地方。

sentences.en: During the summer term we would play cricket at the village ground.
sentences.cn: 夏季学期里我们常在村里的空地上玩板球。
